entries.text: Thank you for calling Customer Support. This call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Yes, I'm calling to check on the status of an order I placed last week. I haven't received any updates.
Certainly! I can help with that. Can I get your order number, please?

Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I have order 12345ABC here. To give you a shipping update, it looks like your package is currently en route. Do you have your tracking number handy, or would you like me to provide it?
I don't have it. If you could provide it, that would be great.
No problem. Your tracking number is XYZ789. It appears the scheduled delivery is currently showing as tomorrow, October 27th.
Tomorrow? Okay, that's good to know. Is there any way to see the current package location?

Yes, let me check that for you. According to the tracking information, the last scan indicates your package is currently at our regional distribution center in Denver. It should be loaded onto a delivery truck early tomorrow morning. You can also use that tracking number XYZ789 on the shipping carrier's website for more detailed information throughout the day tomorrow.
Denver, okay. That makes sense. So, definitely tomorrow then?

Yes, the scheduled delivery is for tomorrow, October 27th. However, please understand that this is an estimated date and could be subject to minor changes. The most accurate information will come from the tracking number on the carrier's website. We will also send you an email with a final shipping update once it's out for delivery.
Great! That's all I needed to know. Thank you so much for your help.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
